content: Great philosophies here. You’ve got to test things if you are going to succeed. The best business owners I work with and teach are willing to jump into things and try new ways of doing things. Those that struggle and get held back aren’t willing to take those chances. I’ve certainly failed a lot. And the most successful business owners I know have failed a lot. Thanks for getting the message out! R. Shawn McBride www.mcbrideforbusiness.com
